Operation 'Get_OMDb Search' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, poor_ai_interpretability. Original summary 'OMDb Search' is too generic and lacks action orientation. Description omits critical details about parameters (search type, pagination), authentication requirements (API key), and response structure. Enhanced version clarifies search methods, return values, pagination support, and authentication to improve AI agent decision-making about when and how to use this operation.

data.current_description: Find a movie, series or episode from the OMDb by title, IMDb-id or by free-text search
data.summary_suggestion: Search for movies, series, or episodes by title or IMDb ID
data.description_suggestion: Searches the Open Movie Database for movies, series, or episodes using multiple search methods. Accepts search by exact title, IMDb ID, or free-text search query. Returns matching results with basic metadata including title, year, type, and IMDb ID. Supports pagination through result pages. Requires API key authentication via query parameter.
